casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Drew, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellants.

[Cite as State ex rel. Drew v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 176.]

(No. 95-2220 Submitted May 12, 1998 Decided June 17, 1998.) William D. Snyder & Associates and John Lesko, for appellee. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and James M. Carroll, Assistant Attorney General, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., and Lundberg Stratton, J., dissent and would reverse the judgment of the court of appeals.
